official-title.#text:
To prohibit further action on the proposed rule regarding changes to Medicare prescription drug
			 benefit programs.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not
			 take any action (through promulgation of a final or interim final
			 regulation, issuance of regulatory or program guidance, use of Federal
			 payment audit procedures, or other enforcement or administrative action,
			 policy, or practice) to implement any provision of the proposed regulation
			 (relating to policy and technical changes to the Medicare Advantage and
			 part D programs under the Medicare program) published on January 10, 2014
			 (79 Fed. Reg. 1918 et seq.) insofar as such regulation relates to the
			 provisions of
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Health and Human Services

, including
			 the application of such provisions to MA–PD plans under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: part D of title XVIII of the Social Security Act

header.#text: Protecting seniors from cancelled prescription drug coverage, fewer choices, and increased premiums
